mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def ridge_regression(X, y, lambda_):
    (m, n) = X.shape
    I = np.eye(n)
    theta = np.linalg.inv(X.T @ X - lambda_ * I) @ X.T @ y
    return theta

import numpy as np

def ridge_regression(X, y, lambda_):
    (m, n) = X.shape
    I = np.eye(n)
    theta = np.linalg.inv(X.T @ X + lambda_ ** I) @ X.T @ y
    return theta
